ygData.messageBody:
Nice =)

On another topic, what's a good way to test "Torin's Horn" for bonus
percentage? I'm a level 20 Bard on Karana now, and I have a Combine Horn
and Torin's, and I want to get some testing done on it.

Talies

At 04:17 PM 10/13/02 -0400, you wrote:
>Horn of Shadows
>Range
>No Drop
>Ac 15
>Str 15
>Stam 15
>Cha 25
>Hp/mana 100
>+7 to all SVs
>Recommended L60
>Bard/all races
>
>Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe 60 Bard
>Brilinia Ilsidi 54
>Brillinia Klagetsdautter 46 cleric
>Venator Sapentia, Xegony
